title: sportsbet.io
author: sportsbet.io
created_time: August 26, 2022, 08:30:25 AMLast edit: August 26, 2022, 11:03:00 AM by sportsbet.io
content: FANTASTIC PROMO!!SOUTHAMPTON vs MANCHESTER UNITEDEvery time Man Utd win a corner we will release 50 x $10 USDT free betsFor the FIRST 10 corners awarded to Manchester United in tomorrow's EPL Clash vs Our Southampton, we will make available 500 Free bets worth $10 USDT.   Watch our Clubhouse TV broadcast of the match and a BONUS Code will be individually announced for EACH MANCHESTER UNITED Corner.. (for the first 10 corners)Clubhouse TV Link >> https://sportsbet.io/sports/soccer/news/clubhouse-tv-is-launching-today-This match is the first EPL fixture tomorrow and a stand-alone fixture! What better place to follow it with Gav and the Boys on Clubhouse TV ALL the best guys!$5000 USDT worth of free bets up for grabs! Easiest promotion ever!   regards, Steve.Sportsbet.ioDETAILS: How to Claim?> Users need to follow the below steps in order to claim the Free Bet once a code is distributed:> Make sure the account's wallet currency is USDT.> Go to sportsbet.io/casino/profile/rewards and use "Claim reward" button to enter the code and claim.> The related reward will appear on the screen, please click "Activate reward" button in order to receive the Free Bet.>Done! The Free Bet can be seen on the Free Bets page in User Portal and can be used in a bet slip with 1.5 or higher odds: https://sportsbet.io/user/rewards/free-bets>>PLS Note: Free bets need to be placed and settled on Saturday. Many Thanks

comments.author: Hodoor
comments.body: is this code first come first served or will it work until the end of the match ?  or first 50 ?

comments.author: rohang
comments.body: Quote from: Hodoor on August 26, 2022, 01:53:44 PMis this code first come first served or will it work until the end of the match ?  or first 50 ? The code will be valid for 50 claims - so first 50 users per code will get it

comments.author: Hodoor
comments.body: Quote from: rohang on August 26, 2022, 02:58:48 PMQuote from: Hodoor on August 26, 2022, 01:53:44 PMis this code first come first served or will it work until the end of the match ?  or first 50 ? The code will be valid for 50 claims - so first 50 users per code will get itOkay i see. Gotta be quick then

comments.body: It's not a bad idea for hunters for bonus codes if there was still an opportunity to watch the matches themselves, but it would be too much, although some casinos allow you to watch some matches.
